english.segment1: You're Alone. You Miss Her. But She's Far From Home. No More Blue Skies. It's Another Cloudy Day
english.segment2: Take It For Granted. I'll Never Work. But You're Thinking. About Her Again. She Lives Too Far Away
english.segment3: You Can't Forget. How Much This. One Girl Means. Your Sun Is Gone. It's Another Cloudy Day
english.segment4: And She's Gone. She May Not Come Back. But She's Got Your Heart. And That Might Be Enough
